data.name: Go Clubbing VR
data.description:
Experience the thrill of the club scene like never before. Get ready to embark on an exhilarating journey where the party never stops and the energy is contagious. Whether you're a seasoned club-goer or a curious newcomer, this immersive experience will transport you to the heart of the most vibrant and electrifying nightclubs.

Step onto the virtual dance floor and feel the pulsating energy as the music envelops you. Go Clubbing VR offers a wide range of music genres to suit every taste. Lose yourself in the rhythm and create unforgettable moments with friends and fellow virtual clubbers.

Each venue is meticulously designed to provide a unique and immersive experience, transporting you from underground warehouses to upscale rooftop lounges.

Go Clubbing VR isn't just about dancing—it's about connecting with others. Socialize with friends from around the globe. Engage in lively conversations. The virtual community is vibrant and welcoming, offering endless opportunities for social interaction.

Go Clubbing VR brings the exhilaration of clubbing right to your fingertips. Whether you're seeking an escape from reality, a platform for self-expression, or simply a place to let loose and have fun, this immersive virtual reality experience delivers on all fronts. Get ready to party like never before. The club is calling—will you answer?

translations.long_description:
Clubmixed is proud to present Go Clubbing our fully interactive virtual club.  Explore two fabulous rooms with a host of DJs streaming in explosive video and audio sets.  We will be regularly updating this experience with new DJs from around the world but currently, the list is as follows

Underground Room
•	KNOTEN (SW)
•	NARK (US)
•	SAMMY CALANTHE (US)
•	GUTTO SERTA (BR)
•	DJ BETTER (KR)
•	BEEJAY (KR)
•	BLACKLIQUID (US)
•	CLOWN WARFARE (UK)
VIP Room
•	IC DJ (UK)
•	KROISANT (US)
•	ECO 3 (VEN)
•	COOLY G (UK)
•	DJ RONEY JAY (UK)
•	RUBIN PALACIOS (ES)
•	JAILHOUSE ROCKS (UK)
If you are a DJ and would like to play in our club please contacts us at djservices@clubmixed.com

CUSTOM AVATARS

WE NOW HAVE CUSTOM AVATARS.  Please use the following link to build your own.

https://clubmixed.readyplayer.me/

THEN USE THE LINK TO MAKE A SHORTCODE AND ENTER ON ENTRY TO THE CLUB

https://tinyurl.com/app
translations.short_description: Clubmixed presents its virtual reality club GO CLUBBING.  Make your own full-bodied and explore our different clubbing environments and dance, chat, and RAVE to your favorite DJs

changelog.change_log:
New Moon Room
Entitlement verification & In-App Purchase capability
New Custom DJ avatars
Various bug fixes
